Test Piece Contest
Halevy [arr. Round]
Llandudno, Conwy, Wales, UK Prizes: £35 and cornet, £15 11 bands entered, 4 competed March contest: 1. Besses, 2. Llan Festiniog This was National Eisteddfod contest.
April 29, 2012, 3:15 p.m. July 1, 2019, 8:28 p.m.
1 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen
2 Gossage Soap Works John James Brady
3 Llan Festiniog Silver Isaac Jones
4 Royal Oakeley Band William Parry
